---------------------------------------------------------------------
General Info
---------------------------------------------------------------------


This was a request.
Originally this recording was very bright and unbalanced, aswell as having some other problems.
I&#039;ve done some changes from the original FLAC albm I worked on. I&#039;ve equalized the tracks quite alot, both to get the overall tone more to my liking, aswell as correcting/equalizing some annoying artifacts like ringing or resonant frequencies that I can&#039;t stand to listen to, especially on headphones.
Also originally this recording is quite flat and uncompressed, which can be great since the sond is very open. But I added a compressor aswell as being slightly more aggressive with limiting the output, in order to get a bit more ducking and instrument interaction to the songs, which I think can sound better if done in moderation, especially if you have hall/room reverbs on drums so that they aren&#039;t as "sterile".

Hope you enjoy, and comment on the torrent comment section if you want to.
